metadata.title: CVE-2018-10244 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata version 4.0.4 incorrectly handles the parsing of an EtherNet/IPPDU. A malformed PDU can cause the parsing code to read beyond theallocated data because DecodeENIPPDU in app-layer-enip-commmon.c has aninteger overflow during a length check.

criterions.comment: suricata package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
